meanings.definition: To decorate excessively or too elaborately.
meanings.sent1: She always overdecorates her house for the holidays, with lights and ornaments everywhere.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overdecorates his office with so many pictures and plants that it looks cluttered.
meanings.sent3: The party planner overdecorates the venue with so many balloons that it looks like a circus!
meanings.sent4: Her writing style overdecorates the simple story, making it hard to follow.
meanings.sent5: The artist overdecorates the canvas with bright colors, creating a chaotic masterpiece.
